posts.postText: My name is antisocial21 (YES THAT's my real life name, don't have a heart attack) and I like to troll.  Little kids like Link Freeman and Crausidia really irritate me and just make me want to shoot people.  Sometimes I feel like rdming the entire TTT server because the server is full of dumb fucks who rdm and don't know their right from left.  You might say that I'm psychotic, perhaps I am, perhaps I'm not; but who's gonna give shit after I shoot you in the face.  Favorite Song: Echoes by Pink Floyd.  Interested in Women.  Currently attending college.  Friends with practically everyone on the TTT server.  And then there are others who aren't my friends, those others who are sometimes complete dip shits or they sound like 5 year old girls (LINK), others who make me want to RAGE.  If your balls haven't dropped yet (CRAUSY AND LINK) and your voice would make Jesus praise Satan, just watch out, you never know who has a knife and who is standing behind you.

Well you seem like a peacefull pacifist. 
Welcome to the forums. 
;3
